description: Number of i such that d(i)<d(i-1), where Sum{d(i)*7^i: i=0,1,...,m} is the base 7 representation of n.
maple: A037805 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,7);    for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)<op(i-1,dgs) then            a := a+1 ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 16 2015
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(d = Vecrev(digits(n, 7))); my(dd = vector(#d-1, k, d[k+1] - d[k])); #select(x->(x<0), dd);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 16 2015
